IGN1L.VS.summary: AB Ignitis grupe generates, distributes, trades, and supplies electricity and heat. It also produces renewable electricity; supplies liquefied natural gas via terminal; trades and distributes natural gas; and constructs, repairs, maintains electricity networks and related equipment, as well as connects customers to electricity networks. In addition, the company provides information technology, telecommunications, and other services; public procurement, accounting, and legal personnel administration services; and payment collection services, as well as engages in the transportation management activities. Further, it operates wind power plants; and produces metal structures, as well as involved in the rental, leasing, repairing, and maintenance services for vehicles. AB Ignitis grupe was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Vilnius, Lithuania.

In addition, the company provides information technology, telecommunications, and other services; public procurement, accounting, and legal personnel administration services; and payment collection services, as well as engages in the transportation management activities. Further, it operates wind power plants; and produces metal structures, as well as involved in the rental, leasing, repairing, and maintenance services for vehicles. AB Ignitis grupe was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Vilnius, Lithuania.

KNR1L.VS.summary: AB Kauno Energija generates and supplies heat to consumers in the cities of Kaunas and Jurbarkas in Kaunas district. The company also generates and distributes electric energy; and maintains engineering structures, such as collectors and manifolds, as well as heat unit equipment. In addition, it is involved in the supervision of indoor heat and hot water supply systems; repair of heat units and other heating equipment; and provision of rental services premises. The company's total installed heat generation capacity includes approximately 672 MW of heat and approximately 681 MW of electricity. As of 31 December, 2019, it supplied heat to 3,571 businesses and organizations, and 116,444 households. AB Kauno Energija is headquartered in Kaunas, the Republic of Lithuania.

LGD1L.VS.summary: Litgrid AB, together with its subsidiaries, operates electricity transmission systems in Lithuania. It serves electricity transmission grid users and suppliers of balancing and regulating electricity. The company was formerly known as LITGRID turtas AB and changed its name to Litgrid AB in March 2011. The company is based in Vilnius, Lithuania. Litgrid AB is a subsidiary of EPSO-G UAB.
